org.openlca.core.math

Interface IMatrixSolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavaSolver

    public interface IMatrixSolver
    Interface for linear algebra and matrix problems that we need to solve in openLCA. We provide different implementations for these functions also in other packages which are based on high performance libraries like Eigen and OpenBLAS.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IMatrixFactory<?> getMatrixFactory()
      Returns the matrix factory of this solver.
      IMatrix invert(IMatrix a)
      Calculates the inverse of the given matrix.
      double[] multiply(IMatrix m, double[] v)
      Calculates a matrix-vector product.
      IMatrix multiply(IMatrix a, IMatrix b)
      Returns the matrix product of the given matrices.
      void scaleColumns(IMatrix m, double[] v)
      Scales the columns of matrix m with the factors in v.
      double[] solve(IMatrix a, int idx, double d)
      Solves the system of linear equations A * s = d.

    • Method Detail

      • solve

        double[] solve(IMatrix a,
               int idx,
               double d)
        Solves the system of linear equations A * s = d. In openLCA this is used to calculate the scaling factors of an inventory where the vector d has just a single entry.
        Parameters:
        a - the technology matrix A
        d - the demand value (the entry in the vector d).
        idx - the index of the entry in the demand vector.
        Returns:
        the calculated scaling vector s

      • invert

        IMatrix invert(IMatrix a)
        Calculates the inverse of the given matrix.

      • multiply

        IMatrix multiply(IMatrix a,
                 IMatrix b)
        Returns the matrix product of the given matrices.

      • multiply

        double[] multiply(IMatrix m,
                  double[] v)
        Calculates a matrix-vector product. In openLCA we use this for example when we calculate the inventory result: g = B * s

      • scaleColumns

        void scaleColumns(IMatrix m,
                  double[] v)
        Scales the columns of matrix m with the factors in v. This is equivalent to m * diag(v) but can be implemented in a more efficient way.

      • getMatrixFactory

        IMatrixFactory<?> getMatrixFactory()
        Returns the matrix factory of this solver.
